ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Mechanicus: Armoury R1.1 Combat Extended Patch
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.1 Patches my armoury mod to work with combat extended
load order
Combat Extended Adeptus Mechanicus: Armoury R1.0 Adeptus Mechanicus: Armoury R1.0 Combat Extended Patch other Adeptus Mechanicus mods
Known issues Currently disables my Special weapon rules (Rapid Fire, Gets Hot, Hot Shot, Overcharged) Disables Laser effect Necron Gauss Weaponry is functional and use no ammo
